transcript:
Hello?
Hello.
Hello. Ha hello, kaun bol raha hai?
Afternoon sir, VK Food Product se baat kar rahe hain, VK Tripur Kumar ji.
Nahi, main Raju Mahato baat kar raha hun.
Ap kahan se baat kar rahe hain?
Main IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hun sir. Abhi unhone ek ticket open kiya hai.
Nahi, main wahan se baat nahi kar raha hun abhi, hai na?
Achha, sir se baat ho jayegi kya meri?
Main actually unka number aapko bhej sakta hun. Aapka yahi hai WhatsApp number?
Mera number yahi hai. Unka number last mein sir 729 hai kya?
729 ha shayad yahi hai mujhe aisa.
729 na? Basically wo call to lag nahi rahi is vajah se maine secondary pe kiya hai ki aapne ticket to nahi open kiya hai, sir ne kiya hai na?
Nahi, maine nahi nahi kiya hai, sir ne kiya.
Thik hai, thik hai. Ha sir ne ek ticket open kiya hai. Main kar leti hun call agar sir pick kar lete hain to.
Okay. Ji ji, thik hai sir, thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive wants to confirm ticket opening.

Resolution:

- Customer confirmed he did not open the ticket.
- Executive will call the correct person.

Next Steps: 

- None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, verification, call
